title: Mail address / Mail Consolidation in USA
snippet:
We are a UK based online retailer of ladies footwear. The following explains what we are looking for.

For a long term basis we are looking for a virtual USA postal address for our customers to return goods.
We also require parcel consolidation.
We would like to use our own courier service to return our parcels back to the U.K. We are expecting about 100 parcels per month.

In short we would like someone to receive our parcels , batch them together so we can arrange collection through DHL 

We can discuss the price per parcel or a monthly basis.
